the temple has an magnificent view from the top .
a lot of people come to visit daily .

output.sentences: Jason's favorite way to occupy his time was exploring.
He would travel to far-away destinations just to see them with his own eyes.
He enjoyed partaking in this pastime with some of his closest friends.
This adventure required a treacherous hike to the top of a mountain.
But at the end of the day it was worth it just for the view.
